-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Unweaving lists
--   
--   Unweaving lists
@package data-list-unweave
@version 0.1.0.0


-- | <h1>Data.List.Unweave</h1>
--   
--   Functions for unweaving lists.
module Data.List.Unweave

-- | <i>O(n)</i>. Unweave a list, such that the two components interleaved
--   are the original list.
unweave :: [a] -> ([a], [a])

-- | <i>O(n)</i>. Unweave a list, such that the three components
--   interleaved are the original list.
unweave3 :: [a] -> ([a], [a], [a])
